hero.title: Revolutionizing Beauty Through AI Innovation
hero.subtitle: Where cutting-edge artificial intelligence meets dermatological expertise to transform your skincare journey
hero.description: At Skinior, we believe everyone deserves personalized, scientific-backed skincare solutions. Our mission is to democratize professional beauty consultations through revolutionary AI technology.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To make professional-grade skin analysis and personalized beauty consultations accessible to everyone, anywhere, anytime through the power of artificial intelligence and expert dermatological knowledge.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Founded by a team of dermatologists, AI researchers, and beauty experts, Skinior was born from the vision of bridging the gap between advanced technology and personalized skincare. We recognized that millions of people struggle with skin concerns but lack access to professional guidance.
story.highlight: Our breakthrough came when we developed an AI system that could analyze skin with the same accuracy as clinical dermatological assessments, making expert-level analysis available instantly to anyone with a smartphone.

technology.title: Our Technology
technology.description: Our proprietary AI engine uses advanced computer vision and machine learning algorithms trained on millions of dermatological images and clinical data.

features.title: 98% Clinical Accuracy
features.description: Our AI matches the accuracy of professional dermatological assessments

features.description: Comprehensive analysis including texture, pigmentation, wrinkles, pores, and hydration

features.description: Instant analysis and recommendations in under 3 seconds
